About the Company: V2 Retail Ltd is engaged in running a wide chain of retails stores. The company has pioneered in bringing the concept of hyper-markets in India. Their retail store caters to the needs of all age groups -- from kids to senior citizens. The store provide a wide range of products and services in the area of home furnishing, food and beverages, sports and fitness, footwear, mobile solutions, apparels, travel accessories, household and stationary.
